snippet.title: Duality: An Era of Stone Trailer
snippet.description:
Duality: An Era of Stone Trailer

Download Now on Google Play Store.
http://bit.do/dualityAEOS

Duality: An Era of Stone is live in the Google Play Store on Early Access. We are really excited to launch our humble Match-3 adventure into this step and we eagerly await player feedback.

What is the game about?

The Story: 

You are a deity, building your first world! Using Duality Tiles you will create resources for your population, face challenges, and make difficult decisions. The choices you make along the way will affect how your population perceives you.
 
In this game:
~ The Duality Counter triggers a board flip, changing which matches are available every few moves
~ Customize with original handmade art, and sound effects
~ Avoid triggering calamities in your realm
~ Use special powers to achieve your goals
~ Grow your population and see their story unfold before your eyes
~ Unlock avatar customizations based on your choices
